title: #weAREhere Women in Tech 2017 Celebrations
description: #weAREhere invites you to celebrate a new start of a brand new year at the wonderful whimsical Liquor Rooms with all our friends from Coding Grace, Digiwomen, Ireland Girl Geek Dinners, R Ladies, Women Who Code Dublin, and many more.

title: PyLadies Dublin January Meetup @ Demonware
description: We are delighted to announce that Demonware is hosting us in our Jan PyLadies meetup.

title: WITS EVENT: Imposter Syndrome
description: FEEL LIKE A FRAUD? You Could Be Struggling with ‘Imposter Syndrome’. Workshop will be led by Pauline Sargent, Founder of DigiWomen

title: Inspirefest 2017
description: Inspirefest is a truly unique international festival of technology, science, design and the arts, which also happens to place diversity and inclusion at its heart.

title: Allyship Workshop at Kats Conf
description: Kats Conf is delighted to announce Coding Grace and Workday are partnering together on an Allyship workshop. This event is open to everyone and is free to attend.

title: Ireland Girl Geek Dinners February Meetup
description: A showcase on the women who work in the Dublin Workday office highlighting the areas where women make a difference in the company's technology, innovation, and culture.

title: PyLadies Dublin February Meetup @ Qualtrics
description: We are delighted to have Qualtrics hosting our Feb meetup and they will be providing food and drink as well.

title: I Wish Conference, Cork
description: I Wish is an initiative to inspire, encourage and motivate young secondary school female students to pursue careers in STEM.

title: I Wish Conference, Dublin
description: I Wish is an initiative to inspire, encourage and motivate young secondary school female students to pursue careers in STEM.
